articles.title: World pauses to commemorate International Holocaust Remembrance Day - AP News
articles.description: People across Europe and beyond are commemorating International Holocaust Remembrance Day. They are pausing to reflect on the killing of millions of lives and attempts to wipe out Jewish life in Europe more than eight decades ago. International Holocaust Reme…
articles.content: WARSAW, Poland (AP) Holocaust survivors, politicians and regular people commemorated International Holocaust Remembrance Day on Tuesday, gathering at somber events across Europe and beyond to reflect… [+4834 chars]

articles.author: Karla Adam, Katrina Northrop, Lyric Li
articles.title: As Trump shuffles global order, U.K. prime minister heads to Beijing - The Washington Post
articles.description: Keir Starmer’s visit is part of a flurry of diplomacy between Europe and China, but risks angering President Donald Trump.
articles.content: LONDON Prime Minister Keir Starmer is set to visit China this week, aiming to forge a more consistent, pragmatic relationship with Beijing as the United Kingdom and other intermediate powers reassess… [+112 chars]
